welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Richmond, a charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and rich history. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

restaurants.name: Moon Rock Cafe
restaurants.description: Moon Rock Cafe is a restaurant located in Richmond.

restaurants.name: Rivers Restaurant
restaurants.description: Rivers Restaurant is a restaurant located in Richmond.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with modern facilities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Northolt Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly domestic and European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly European and some long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The busiest terminal at Heathrow, serving a mix of long-haul and European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly long-haul flights for British Airways and Iberia.

wifi.note: Free for the first 45 minutes, then a fee applies.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport handles all commercial flights and provides amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport caters to private and chartered flights, offering exclusive services and facilities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport, providing services for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private jet passengers, offering VIP services and amenities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a 4-hour time limit per session.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gatwick Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport serves mainly international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, with premium options for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redhill Aerodrome serves as the primary hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Redhill Aerodrome caters to private and charter flights, providing a more personalized and efficient experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport for passengers to stay connected.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luton Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Luton Airport Parkway Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves as the train station for Luton Airport, providing easy access to and from London.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free Wi-Fi throughout the airport by connecting to the LLA Free Wi-Fi network.
